snippet.title: Explore France in The Sims 3 World Adventures!
snippet.description: Get a first look at Champs Les Sims, France, the third and final location in The Sims 3 World Adventures! The adventure is near. In Stores 11.17.Check out the first reveal of Shang Simla, China, the second location in The Sims 3 World Adventures with screenshots and a gameplay trailer!
